attributes.action: Create and INDEPENDANT petitions website which is not regultated by the Labour Party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I beleive that the petitions website is strongly edited by the current Labour Government.
We need to have a Petition system that is competely independant of the current government and any other political party, which must not be able to be edited for any purpose.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
